TopicTitle: The Kerbal Megagalaxy (A config merging every planet pack)

Articles.Content:
This is something I have been thinking about for a long time. A kerbal Megagalaxy! Basically, it's a very large planet pack compilation combining EVERY planet pack I can find.

I'm not posting this on "add-on" development because I won't release a download link, just screenshots.

If you have any planet pack suggestions for my megagalaxy, feel free to post them here.

I might post a download link if I get the permission from the packs' owner.

Current planet packs I plan to add :

KerbalBinary

KerbalGalaxy

Astrofox's planet pack

Galactic Neighboroud

All the packs which works with Galactic Neighboroud

Feel free to suggest any other pack.

To the planet pack's autors : If you agree to give me permission to add your mod to a download of the pack, just PM me about it. If I get enough permission, I will create another thread on add-on developpement.

Edited September 6, 2015 by Elowiny
Erm....don't want to rain on your parade and all, but that is exactly what Galactic Neighborhood has set out to do! We want to get all packs in a place that's logical and worth visiting...
This would be awesome! Please do do this, but I will not be sad if they can't post a download. I would love to see you screenshot it though!
